Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can demonstrate in their drawing that the device uses sound for communication.
The student can show in their drawing the materials used to build the device, such as string and cups.
The student can include in their drawing the explanation of how the device works to send and receive information.
The student can depict the people using the device to communicate.
The student can illustrate how this device helps communication over a distance, highlighting the importance of technology in daily life.
